HediffDef.label: animal controller
HediffDef.description: This creature was genetically modified with a controller booster.
A prosthetic animal leg strengthened with bear muscles, and ending in a powerful bear claw that adds a powerful melee attack.
HediffDef.label: animal Implant: bear leg
animal Implant: lizard leg
HediffDef.description: A bionic animal leg reinforced with tough lizard skin.

HediffDef.label: animal Implant: elephant leg
HediffDef.description: A bionic animal leg reinforced with muscle tissue from a powerful elephant.

HediffDef.label: animal Implant: cat tail
HediffDef.description: A tail implant that uses genetic splicing with feline genes to substitute a broken or missing tail. This implant is not meant to replace a healthy tail.

HediffDef.label: animal Implant: scyther tail
HediffDef.description: A scyther tail created by attaching a scyther blade to an animal's tail.

HediffDef.label: animal Implant: reinforced tail
HediffDef.description: An advanced animal tail, even more powerful than a natural one.

HediffDef.label: animal Implant: canid eye
HediffDef.description: An eye implant that uses genetic splicing with canid genes to give an old (or damaged) eye decent vision. This implant is not meant to replace healthy eyes.

HediffDef.label: animal Implant: insectile eye
HediffDef.description: A bionic implant which gives the creature compound insectile eyes. Compared with simple eyes, compound eyes possess a very large view angle, and can detect fast movement.

HediffDef.label: animal Implant: bionic thrumbo eye
HediffDef.description: A bionic eye reinforced with specialized photoreceptors from a powerful thrumbo.

HediffDef.label: animal Implant: rodent ear
HediffDef.description: An ear implant that uses genetic splicing with rodent genes to give an old (or damaged) ear decent hearing. This implant is not meant to replace healthy ears.

HediffDef.label: animal Implant: moth tympanal organ
HediffDef.description: A bionic implant adding a moth tympanal organ to the creature's ear. Moths can hear sounds of a higher frequency than any bat can produce.

HediffDef.label: animal Implant: elephant auditory receptor
HediffDef.description: This elephant auditory receptor can scan a really wide band of frequencies.

HediffDef.label: animal Implant: rodent nose
HediffDef.description: An implant that uses genetic splicing with rodent genes to give an old (or damaged) nose decent smelling. This implant is not meant to replace healthy noses. Can't be installed on birds and insects.
An implant that uses genetic splicing with insectoid genes to give the ability to detect pheromones, thus improving the olfactory system. Can't be installed on birds and (ironically) insects.
HediffDef.label: animal Implant: insectoid pheromones

HediffDef.description: A bionic implant adding a small thrumbo horn where the creature's nose used to be. This implant acts as a nose, allowing the creature to breathe and smell, and can be used by the creature in melee. Birds, insects, and creatures that already have a thrumbo horn don't have enough space on their skull to install this implant.
HediffDef.label: animal Implant: miniature thrumbo horn
animal Implant: wolf fangs
HediffDef.description: An implant that uses genetic splicing with wolf genes to give an old (or damaged) jaw decent functioning. This implant is not meant to replace healthy jaws.

HediffDef.label: animal Implant: insect mandibles
HediffDef.description: A bionic implant adding insect mandibles to the creature's face. Insect mandibles improve manipulation and eating, while also working as an offensive weapon

HediffDef.label: animal Implant: bionic thrumbo jaws
HediffDef.description: A bionic implant adding thrumbo jaws to the creature's mouth. These creatures devour trees, so you can imagine their jaws are up to the task.

HediffDef.label: animal Implant: muffalo spine
HediffDef.description: A spine implant that uses genetic splicing with muffalo genes to give an old (or damaged) spine decent functioning. This implant is not meant to replace healthy spines.
A bionic implant adding a sturdy crocodile spine to the creature's skeletal system.
HediffDef.label: animal Implant: crocodile spine

HediffDef.description: A bionic implant adding a plasteel structure with active mechanites to the creature's skeletal system.
HediffDef.label: animal Implant: reinforced bionic spine

HediffDef.description: An implant that uses chicken brain tissue to patch damaged neurological pathways. This implant is intended for brain-dead creatures.
HediffDef.label: animal Implant: chicken brains

HediffDef.description: A bionic implant using monitor lizard brain tissue. This highly intelligent reptile has very quick reflexes.
HediffDef.label: animal Implant: monitor lizard brain

HediffDef.description: A bionic brain implant using thrumbo neural tissue. Superb intelligence and reflexes.
HediffDef.label: animal Implant: bionic thrumbo brain

HediffDef.description: An implant that uses chemfuel to pump blood through the animal's body. This implant is intended for creatures whose heart is failing catastrophically, since it is less efficient than a natural heart.
HediffDef.label: animal Implant: boomalope heart

HediffDef.description: A bionic heart implant using a reinforced shell of insectoid chitin for protection. This is a heart designed to take a beating. Pun intended, but it's the last one, I promise.
HediffDef.label: animal Implant: chitinous heart
animal Implant: reinforced bionic heart
HediffDef.description: A bionic heart strengthened by the action of active mechanites.
An implant that uses muffalo genes to increase breathing capacity.
HediffDef.label: animal Implant: muffalo lung
animal Implant: bear liver
HediffDef.description: An implant that uses bear genes to improve function of the liver. Specially useful for those alcoholic chickens.

HediffDef.label: animal Implant: chicken kidney
HediffDef.description: An implant that uses chicken genes to improve function of the kidney. Birds have large kidneys. Yep, you learned that today.

HediffDef.label: animal Implant: boomalope stomach
HediffDef.description: An implant that uses boomalope genes to improve function of the stomach.
